text: 🚨 27% of Adults Face At Least One Healthcare Affordability Challenge 💸🏥A new study published in Health Affairs reveals that healthcare affordability is a significant issue for low- and middle-income families in the US. 💼👩‍👧‍👦27% of non-senior adults live in families with severe healthcare affordability issues, such as high out-of-pocket cost burden, medical debt, or forgone medical care. 🤕💔This number jumps to almost 46% when researchers used more broadly defined healthcare financial strains, including delayed care. 🤔👀The study paints a more complete picture of healthcare financial pressures in the US and has significant policy implications. 🏛️💭It's time for policymakers to take action and address the issue of healthcare affordability. 🗣️🚨#HealthcareReform
